name: IsochroneMap
tagline: Draw an isochrone city map overlay using data from a public transport authority
body:
Using station and connection data from a public transport authority an overlay using the google maps api is created that shows how long it takes from a certain point in the city to any other point, either by walking or by public transport.

[Prototype for Vienna](vienna-testmap20-routetest.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
